title: Memory efficient scrolling
description: Some libraries allocate more items in memory to achieve good performance. FlashList does not recreate items as a user scrolls, making it noticeably more memory efficient.

title: Developer friendly
description: FlashList is especially easy-to-use thanks to FlatList's API. Simply change the name of your component and you are good to go.
alt: Developer using React Native FlashList in their laptop.

title: Snappy on all platforms
description: On iOS, other lists perform well, but on Android, they fall short. FlashList performs well even on low-end Android devices.
alt: Girl enjoying a list created using FlashList on a phone

title: Extra configuration for even better performance.
description: Apart from FlatList props, FlashList offers a set of extra props to tweak the performance even more.

title: Buttery smooth complex layouts
description: FlashList supports layouts like Masonry, which allows you to render a Pinterest-like layout. This is Shopify's Shop app taking advantage of MasonryFlashList component.
alt: Masonry layout React Native list created using FlashList
